name: Jenkins
description: Jenkins is a popular open-source tool for automating software development processes.

environment-variables.name: JENKINS_EXTERNAL_PORT
environment-variables.description: The port that the server will listen on.

environment-variables.name: JENKINS_EXTERNAL_INBOUND_AGENT_PORT
environment-variables.description: The port that the server will listen on, only for inbound jenkins agent which interact with jenkins controller

environment-variables.name: JENKINS_HOME
environment-variables.description: folder to mount into jenkins_data container's folder
